titleStmt.title: Christes bloodie sweat, or the Sonne of God in his agonie. By I.F.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Joseph, 1577?-1637, attributed name.
Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ralph Blower, and are to be sold at his house vpon Lamberthill,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Joseph Fletcher; this attribution is, however, dubious, and this more likely by John Ford.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
